title: Decision Making

questions.text: When we have a decision to make together, I'd like us to...
choices: Go with our gut and figure it out as we go
Talk through the options and decide together
Each think about it separately, then compare notes
Take our time - no rush on big decisions
Other / It depends

questions.text: If our plans fall through last minute, I hope we...
choices: See it as a chance to do something spontaneous
Quickly come up with a backup plan together
Acknowledge the disappointment, then move on
Have a list of backup ideas ready for moments like this
Other / It depends

questions.text: For date nights, I'd love it if we...
choices: Keep it spontaneous - decide when we're already out
Take turns surprising each other
Plan something special together ahead of time
Have a mix of planned dates and 'let's just see' nights
Other / It depends

questions.text: When we're planning something together (a trip, a purchase, an event), I tend to...
choices: Jump in and start making it happen
Brainstorm ideas and narrow down together
Research options before we discuss
Let you take the lead and give input when asked
Other / It depends

questions.text: When we're not sure what to do, I think the best approach is...
choices: Just pick something and adjust if needed
Sleep on it and revisit tomorrow
List out the pros and cons together
Talk it through until we're both comfortable
Other / It depends

description: Explore how you'll make decisions as a team.
